problem.p: In the diagram, \(M_1\) and \(\theta\) are given. The coefficient of static friction between \(M_1\) and the incline is \(\mu_s\).
You can type \(M_1\), \(\theta\), and \(\mu_s\) as M_1, theta, and mu_s respectively.
Find the minimum value of \(M_2\) that would keep the system in equilibrium.
Find the maximum value of \(M_2\) that would keep the system in equilibrium.
